import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Home from './Home' import Tasks from './Tasks' import Schedule from "./Schedule"; function Navigation(){ const [page, setPage] = useState("home"); function changePage(page){ setPage(page) } const color = { home:"text-gray-600", schedule:"text-gray-600", tasks:"text-gray-600" } color[page]="text-black" return(
